content: rustic cottage dishcloths a knitting pattern collection by esther braithwaite designs skills required these dishcloths are an easy project suitable for a beginning knitter the textured stitches are created from simple repeating patterns of knit and purl stitches measurements finished cloths are approximately 7 25 18 5 cm square when knit at a gauge of 5 stitches and 6 row per inch from left to right hurdle stitch waffle stitch double fleck stitch long raindrops stitch materials about us 7 4 5mm knitting needles the rustic cottage dishcloth collection worsted weight cotton yarn was inspired by our 1902 vacation approximately 1 oz 30g or 50 yards cabin each dishcloth features a classic 45m per cloth textured stitch framed with a models are knit from herrschner s village contrasting garter edge yarns craft cotton in the following colours cream parsley blueberry apple red and lemon ice 1 follow me on instagram @estherjoyknits or go to www estherjoyknits com for more tips tutorials and project ideas rustic cottage dishcloths a knitting pattern collection by esther braithwaite designs hurdle stitch cloth green contrast edge row 7 & 8 knit cast on 36 stitches in continue in pattern for green using the long-tail 40 more row cast on method garter stitch edging immediately cut yarn and join cream row 49-52 knit garter stitch edging contrast edge row 1-4 knit row 53 join green knit cast off knitwise hurdle stitch pattern row 5 & 6 k3 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last 3 stitches k3 2 follow me on instagram @estherjoyknits or go to www estherjoyknits com for more
